content: single_crochet in each st around 90 6 single_crochet increase x 3= 24 fold the fins in half and single_crochet the opening 91-92 single_crochet in each st around closed f/o and leave a long tail for sewing 93 6 single_crochet decrease x 3= 21 94 5 single_crochet decrease x 3= 18 95 single_crochet in each st around 96 4 single_crochet decrease x 3= 15 97 3 single_crochet decrease x 3= 12 98 decrease x 6= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed spikes with color c chain 59 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook chain 1 half_double_crochet in same stitch 2 slip_stitch half_double_crochet chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st 2 slip_stitch repeat across f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 5 belly with color b chain 13 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across= 12 2 chain 1 turn increase 10 single_crochet increase= 14 3-4 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 5 chain 1 turn increase 12 single_crochet increase= 16 6-7 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 8 chain 1 turn increase 14 single_crochet increase= 18 9-12 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 13 chain 1 turn decrease 14 single_crochet decrease= 16 14-17 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 18 chain 1 turn decrease 12 single_crochet decrease= 14 19 chain 1 turn decrease 10 single_crochet decrease= 12 20-21 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 22 chain 1 turn decrease 10 single_crochet= 11 23 chain 1 turn decrease 9 single_crochet= 10 24 chain 1 turn decrease 8 single_crochet= 9 25 chain 1 turn decrease 7 single_crochet= 8 26 chain 1 turn decrease 4 single_crochet decrease= 6 27-33 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 34 chain 1 turn decrease 2 single_crochet decrease= 4 35-46 chain 1 turn single_crochet across f/o and leave a very long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 6 assembly head and body 1 take a long strand of white yarn and thread your needle insert the needle into a hole in between the eyes bring the needle to the lower corner of the eye wrap the needle around the outside of the eye insert the needle into a hole on the top of the eye pull a little tightly to create a highlight for the eye repeat for the 2nd eye 2 mark some spots with pins between rounds 6 and 7 embroider 2 nostrils sweet oddity art 7 belly 1 pin the belly onto the bottom of the body 2 sew the belly onto the body sweet oddity art 8 spikes 1 pin the spikes onto the top of the body 2 sew the spikes onto the body fins 1 pin the fins onto the side of the body 2 sew the fins onto the body you have your finished dinosaur thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished dinosaur with me as often as you want i love seeing them sweet
